description:
Track and evaluate the performance of your investment portfolio across stocks, cryptocurrencies, and other assets.


- New: Added MEXC Crypto Exchange as an online price feed.
- Improvement: Enhanced PDF importers for Merkur Privatbank, Tradegate AG, flatex, Hypothekarbank Lenzburg, Trade Republic, Comdirect, DKB, Deutsche Bank, and Bourse Direct.
- Fix: Resolved a crash when switching the securities view while the table was sorted by certain columns.
- Fix: Fixed loading of dividend transactions without an associated security.
- Fix: Improved detection of file types based on file content.
